scripts.dev: npm run migrations:local && concurrently "npm run dev:partykit" "npm run dev:hono" "npm run dev:wrangler" --kill-others --prefix app
scripts.build: npm run clean && vite build --mode client && vite build
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy --branch=staging
scripts.migrations:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.migrations:dev: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --preview
scripts.migrations:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.migrations:create: npx wrangler d1 migrations create DB
